import React from 'react' import './FeaturedProducts.scss' import Card from '../Card/Card' import useFetch from '../../hooks/useFetch' const FeaturedProducts = ({type}) => { const {data,loading,error} = useFetch( `/products?populate=*&[filters][type][$eq]=${type === 'featured' ? 'featured' : 'trending'}&[sort]=createdAt&[limit]=8&[skip]=${Math.floor(Math.random() * 10)}` ) return (

{type} products

{error ? "Something went wrong!" : loading ? "loading" : data?.map((item) => )}
) } export default FeaturedProducts
